data.title: Place to go for a Pick-me-up Lunch--Great service, price, and food
data.text: After a very difficult morning, I had the wonderful opportunity to meet a friend at this Tijuana Flats' location. I must commend Lacey and Kayla for their welcoming and warm customer service.  Lacey greeted us, and helped turn my day around just by the friendly manner by which she took our order.  The way this restaurant is set-up is that you walk up to the counter and place your drink and food order, then another employee brings your meal to your table.  As I waited for my food, I commented to my friend that Lacey's personable approach put a smile on my face and helped change my day for the better.  Next, Kayla brought our food to the table, with continued warmth, and great attention to detail.  She brought us refills before we could ask, and quickly corrected a small omission on my order.  Finally, my taco Tuesday meal was phenomenal. My portions were splendid and the steak was tender.  I highly recommend this restaurant for the food, timely and attractive presentation of the meal, and for the reasonable prices. Especially, I will return for the amazing service offered by these two young ladies.

data.title: GREAT fast Mexican food!
data.text: Great spot in Wellington to enjoy some quick delicious Mexican food.  Love love LOVE the Flautas!!!  And their guacamole is divine!  Don't miss a stop to their sauce bar for everything from mile to Ghost pepper hot!!!  Great stuff!!

data.title: Taco Tuesday's Rock
data.text: Love this place for so many reasons, first of which is the attentive staff. The food is delish and Taco Tuesday is fantastic. 2 tacos, chips, soda for $5.49. My fave is the chicken and black bean taco with all the toppings (except jalapeños) super affordable, plentiful food and best of all - crushed ice in the drinks!

owner_response.author: TijuanaFlats, Support Center at Tijuana Flats, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the review Suzy. We're glad you enjoy your experience with us and look forward to your next visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Tasty Mexican food
data.text: Clean, varied menu fast courteous service. reasonably priced and family friendly. located in a strip mall with plenty of parking

data.title: Taco Tuesday and so much more
data.text: Better than average Mexican food.  The hot sauces are fun and go from mild to out of this world hot.  The salads are very good.  The tacos are larger than normal.    Good food at a good price.

data.title: Love Tijuana Flats, Dislike this Location
data.text: Let my start by saying I really like TF. One of my favorite places for a quick bite but this location is abysmal.. The workers are very slow, sometimes rude and the locale itself is dirty. The hot sauce bar is always missing at least two sauces because they don't bother refilling on time, queso is microwaved and chips are stale. Avoid this location if you can. They need new management.

data.title: the kids love it
data.text: My son and his 16-17 year old friends love to go there and eat. We have enjoyed our food there and the prices are good.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Food and service are very good.  While waiting for the food I like to look at all the different ceiling tiles painting.  They have a sauce bar with a variety of hot sauces from mild to very very hot.  My husband loves it!  The only thing is that chips are not included with all meals.

data.title: Just great food
data.text: We went here for dinner with the kids. We've been several times before and the food and service are always consistently good!!! My favorite is the carnitas tacos!!

data.title: Great tacos
data.text: I've only been once, but had the Dos tacos. They were very large, fresh and fast. Also being a pepperhead myself, I loved the hot sauce bar. At least ten different hot sauces to try. Very nice. I will return.

data.title: Great, cheap Mexican fare.
data.text: All the usual Mexican favorites.  Tasty, pretty quick, plus, they have whole wheal taco shells for their taco salads!  Noisy, some confusion of orders at times, but, hey, you can't beat Taco Tuesdays if you're on a budget!

data.title: Decent spot for quick tacos etc..kids eat free on Tues.
data.text: Food is decent, atmosphere is fun, hot sauce bar is really good if you like to try different kinds!!

data.title: Excellent
data.text: I am vegan, they helped me figure out what I could eat. The food is excellent, the sauces are a great addition. The price was excellent as well.

data.title: Great "fast food"
data.text: Excellent place for quick and great quality food.  Had the crispy spicy chicken burrito and it was fabulous.  Great selection and combinations.  Great spice bar and service is quick.

data.title: Affordable & Delicious!!
data.text: Love this place!! Came here for dinner on Valentine's Day. Affordable & delicious. Friendly staff. Customizable dishes. Vegetarian friendly. I enjoyed eating outside as it wasn't too hot or too chilly. Will definitely come again or get takeout!!

data.title: Quicken casual
data.text: It's great for what it is    A step above fast food the quality is always good, service is always fast.

data.title: No steak in burrito
data.text:
I order steak burrito , oops no steak just 2 small pieces. Manager correct my burrito and offers free desert 
Price and service excellent

data.title: Fun fast mexican food
data.text: Small but fun environment with lots of cool things for the kids to look at. Food is good and pretty fast.

data.title: Great food and atmosphere
data.text: Have anything you want the way you like it with many sauces to satisfy everyone's palate.  Easy family eating!

data.title: So not what it was...
data.text: It stinks that this restaurant has gone down hill. A simple quesadilla was just gross. The prices have increased greatly and is often more expensive than a sit down Mexican restaurant. They need to overhaul their menu and make their food taste good. We will not be returning.
